    • 构造器详细资料

      • ThreadManager

        public ThreadManager(int poolCount)
        init a thread manager.
        参数:
        poolCount - threadPool thread count.

    • 方法详细资料

      • schedule

        public java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture schedule(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                                                     int initialDelay)
        Schedule a task.
        参数:
        runnable - Runnable task.
        initialDelay - after ~ms task will be scheduled.
        返回:
        ScheduledFuture

      • schedule

        public java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture schedule(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                                                     int initialDelay,
                                                     int delay)
        Schedule a task.
        参数:
        runnable - Runnable task.
        initialDelay - after ~ms task will be scheduled.
        delay - every ~ms task will be scheduled.
        返回:
        ScheduledFuture

      • submit

        public java.util.concurrent.Future submit(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Schedule a task without schedule.
        参数:
        runnable - Runnable task.
        返回:
        Future
